Reviews.Title: Defective Merchantdise
Reviews.Author: davec57
Reviews.Content: I order this and upon receipt of the order found that this item was defective and not what was advertised. When I approached the seller he refuse to refund me saying that it was over a month old and he did not guarantee the item after a month. I advise any one else who buys from this seller examine closely your product before doing anything else.

Reviews.Title: Great cellular phone
Reviews.Author: Miki George
Reviews.Content: The cellular phone was ordered for my daughter. we live outside of the U.S.AThe phone arrived in time and in perfect condition (new, wrapped).There were no problems in activating it in the local cellular provider as it's unlocked.My daughter is very happy with the phone.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Armindo
Reviews.Content: I cannot talk about the product as it is not working. I bought it on September 7th with transformers and gsm phones as an unlocked phone worldwide and it is LOCKED by orange UK. I have been exchanging e-mails with the company and until now I was not able to have my money back and return the i-phone. They said they would send me a label for me to return it to the USA and now they say that they cannot send the label outside USA. I would like Amazon to help us out with this issue because the money was already taken from my credit card and I still do not have a phone or my money back! How disappointing!!!

Reviews.Title: A little upset!
Reviews.Author: Claudia Perez
Reviews.Content: I received my iphone closed and i hope new, however, the accesories are not original and also I doubt the phone could be original! But ok. Also, the box was no the box, I mean, my phone is white, on the box is black, and I bought it 32 gb and the phone is 64 gb, maybe not too bad.

Reviews.Title: iPhone
Reviews.Author: Drumdrizzle
Reviews.Content: Love it! Everything and more than I expected! How did I come right without it?! Ha! Siri is great, delivery was fast, phone condition is as mentioned. 5 stars all around!

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Jojo
Reviews.Content: The delivery process was quick and excellent. The only thing that was a negative was the fact that the screw for the sim card slot did not come with my iPhone 4s. I now have to buy one because It was not included in my box.

Reviews.Title: Defective Item
Reviews.Author: Rohan Kaza
Reviews.Content: This was defective item. The product was said to be factory unlocked gsm worked any where world wide  .Its not working

Reviews.Title: problems with the iphone
Reviews.Author: Valeria Boquimpani
Reviews.Content: i bouth an unlocked iphone and it comes locked :/i whish the amazon.com service culd do something to resolve this big problem cause a pay for de iphone and now i cant use

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Raven
Reviews.Content: Everything came as described! I was able to use the iphone on a T-Mobile network and couldn't be happier to finally have an iphone!

Reviews.Title: i got an used phone
Reviews.Author: Paula Lopez
Reviews.Content: it doesnt say anywhere that it was used, and for the price i payed i thought it was new. I got it ON and with apps downloades... they didnt even took the time to clean it up...very dissapointed

Reviews.Title: Faulty Product
Reviews.Author: Rick Taylor
Reviews.Content: Ordered the product to use overseas. Was suppose to be unlocked. I's not. Should have read all the reviews first. Talked to Apple, they said a report was already generated on this serial number. Therfore it must have been sold once and was a refurbish. This isn't advertized either. So buy at your own risk.Update:I contacted Suppier about the product. They provide me with the instructions to unlock the phone. After several failed attempts they recommended returning the product. They gave me the option of replacement or my money back, less stocking fee. I opted for refund. Although the phone did not work as advertize, Eve in the customers relations dept did her best to help me. She replied promptly to all my E-mails and did her best to make it work. So I have to say even though the product didn't perform as promised, the company did everything it could to satisfy me.

Reviews.Title: there's a line on lcd
Reviews.Author: kv magaoay
Reviews.Content: no charger no headphone i though its a package with accessories so cant use it immediately and lcd have already 2lines on lcd

Reviews.Title: Battery life only 8 hours...!!
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: I changed by Blackberry for this iphone 4S, but the battery is maximum 8 hours life, compared to my ex bb, more than 24 hours.  The bb is more friendly than this iphone.

Reviews.Title: iphone 4s
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: It is just as it should be ,and then the price is so low , you should definately choose it instead of Iphone 5

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: ivan
Reviews.Content: It's an iPhone, need I say more?Simply outstanding. I just inserted a micro sim card from my mobile operator and it worked perfeclty (i live outside the US)

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bells
Reviews.Content: I want to say with not too many Reviews for this company I was skeptical about purchasing the iphone 4S from them. But I took a chance and when I received the product so quickly I was amazed on how quickly it was shipped to me. Also want to add that the iPhone 4S I had received is AWESOME with a great price. Thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Toro
Reviews.Content: Worked perfectly!I received the phone and insert the micro SIM card and voilà! Everything worked perfectly. No need to crack or jail-break the phone.I'm very satisfied with my new iPhone.

Reviews.Title: the display went off after a week of use
Reviews.Author: Nuno
Reviews.Content: The display went off after one week of use. I sent the product back to the seller. They fixed the display, but the battery is not charging. This process took three to four  months and I am with a Iphone that does not work

Reviews.Title: Very good service!
Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: It was a Very good service! And very quickly! Estoy muy contenta. Todo funciona perfecto y como me lo esperaba

Reviews.Title: NEW iPhone is NOT NEW - Refurbished - Do not trust this vendor
Reviews.Author: Speaker new to apple
Reviews.Content: After a year of buying this IPhone from this vendor I had to send it to repair at a Apple Store. To my surprise I discovered that this item was sold to me as new but was not new. It was refurbished in China or Hong Kong. Was not a new item. Do not trust this vendor. He does not sell new items. He sells refurbished as new. Be careful.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Clems
Reviews.Content: When I got my phone it was NOT unlocked. It works pretty fine except that it recently started getting temperature warnings all the time. The charger was also stopped working before a month was up.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4S
Reviews.Author: Fos
Reviews.Content: First iPhone. Have always used a Blackberry. Am happy with the iPhone 4S, works well and iOS easy to use. Have not used Siri. Don't like the fact that you have to have an account at Apple with a Credit card on file if you want to download any apps (even free ones). You cannot set up the account without entering a valid Credit card, but if you use a itunes card (min I've ever seen is $15) you don't need to enter a Credit card. Happy with the product. Find nice headphones and sound is OK. Found Cowon much better as Mp3 player though for music quality.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Pedro Blanco
Reviews.Content: i like it is very good. the phone mobil is best. i true in it .100% good y beautiful.the precious good

Reviews.Title: ¡Just excellent and perfect phone!
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: The phone is great, excellent and completely free. I am very happy with my new iPhone. I tried in my country with the three telephone operators and working properly. I recommend it 100%.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: izilda
Reviews.Content: Recebi no tempo correto, o produto é exatamente o que eu queria, e a negociaçao foi perfeita, a embalagem estava intacta.REcomendo o site e tambem o produto.

Reviews.Title: Great phone great condition great service
Reviews.Author: Sara Henson
Reviews.Content: I received this phone as described truly mint condition.  I received it quickly.  This seller added a phone cover as an unexpectedly nice touch.  I am thrilled with the iPhone 4S. This is my first iPhone I had no idea what I had been missing its fabulous.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!!! Super Fast Delivery!!
Reviews.Author: reef
Reviews.Content: The IPHONE 4S 32 G I bought is just like NEW! No scratches at all (films are still on it) and works perfect with my local company here in the Caribbean. The delivery was super fast too!! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: I like it but u lie say it will work thru AT&T; when I email u
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: So no I don't like it and u know why I will never buy anything from u ever again never
